name: Punkin (Bug Testing)
description:
T'was the night before Christmas, and all through the house...

*Cough*

Punkin had a bit too much to drink last night and overslept way worse than usual. While she did, a familiar Christmas elf vandalized her home and filled it with freeloaders and degenerates.

The only solution? Put a bullet between that cow-titted Christmas elf's eyes.

Note: The game is in a bug-testing phase and may look different from the finished product.

Game contains references to smoking and alcohol-use, as well as sexual/profane themes.
